Security Assessment Reports SAR IT Security Analyst MJHS CORPORATION GROUP March 2015 to February 2018 Developed the audit plan and performed the General Computer Controls testing of Information data model Created a context diagram to represent the interaction between the stakeholders and the system Reviewed business and technical requirements and interpreted and developed them into
